Name: ERO Shooter
About the game: Will you be able to save the galaxy and to keep your crew satisfied? - Overview - ERO Shooter is an erotic top-down space bullet hell game. You'll have to destroy thousands of enemies. In between missions, you'll be able to interact with the crew. - Story - You're the new commander of the Eros, an advanced war space ship. As time goes by, you'll get to know the staff and you'll be able to build relationships with them. - Key features - - 2 game modes: survival and arcade - Dating simulation mechanics - Erotic cinematics
